sn47.6:1.1: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi.
sn47.6:1.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṁ paridevasi:
sn47.6:1.3: ‘mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṁ appapuññā, ye mayaṁ agocare carimha paravisaye.
sn47.6:1.4: Sacejja mayaṁ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye, na myāyaṁ, sakuṇagghi, alaṁ abhavissa, yadidaṁ—yuddhāyā’ti.
sn47.6:1.5: ‘Ko pana te, lāpa, gocaro sako pettiko visayo’ti?
sn47.6:1.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṁvadamānā lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ pamuñci:
sn47.6:1.8: ‘gaccha kho tvaṁ, lāpa, tatrapi me gantvā na mokkhasī’ti.
sn47.6:2.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṁ leḍḍuṭṭhānaṁ gantvā mahantaṁ leḍḍuṁ abhiruhitvā sakuṇagghiṁ vadamāno aṭṭhāsi:
sn47.6:2.2: ‘ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghī’ti.
sn47.6:2.3: Atha kho sā, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṁvadamānā ubho pakkhe sannayha lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ sahasā ajjhappattā.
sn47.6:2.4: Yadā kho, bhikkhave, aññāsi lāpo sakuṇo ‘bahuāgato kho myāyaṁ sakuṇagghī’ti, atha tasseva leḍḍussa antaraṁ paccupādi.
sn47.6:2.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi tattheva uraṁ paccatāḷesi.
sn47.6:2.6: Evañhi taṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47.6:3.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47.6:3.2: Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṁ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47.6:3.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47.6:3.6: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
sn47.6:3.10: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
sn47.6:4.1: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47.6:4.2: Gocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṁ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47.6:4.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47.6:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
sn47.6:4.10: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
sn47.6:4.11: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
